job_title: Child Care Resource in Chilliwack, BC
pros: Good benefits. Good Work life balance encouraged. Employees are given opportunities to offer input and give feedback.
cons: Non profit so pay could be higher.

job_title: Resident Support Worker in Chilliwack, BC
pros: Somewhat ok for entry level position
cons: Trouble meeting payroll demands (several short-pay cheques). Inexperienced and fluctuating management in Youth Services. Not much room for advancement. large staff turnover in youth services. high expectation to volunteer and "donate" your pay for specific/special events (ie not enter into payroll program the hours you actually worked).

pros: Hours, pay, co workers, time off, training
cons: Challenging, demanding work, sometimes with difficult people.
